Html:
Hello!

Thank you for the lib, it's working very well.

I have nevertheless a problem when I try to use it on an iOS plateform.
I'm working in the Unity3D environment, with C# in Mono.
My project is working well with OSX or Windows, but when I try to build it on iOS it seems that the dlls can not be used.

Is there an easy way to make it work?
The Excel library is dependent upon SharpZipLib. If you first build SharpZipLib for iOS, and then reference it from your Excel iOS project, you should be able to build successfully.
